body_html:
I downgraded my tensorflow installation to 0.12.1 release (4d924e7)
After the required API changes, my code seemed to run at a similar speed as I'm seeing with the latest head. So it might be possible that last few weeks I've been running it with the optimization bug with made it 4x faster (by copying the same batch onto all 4 GPUs), and the slowdown I'm seeing now is actually the expected speed given the amount of I/O I'm doing.

I'll debug some more on this, but thanks for the pointers and quick response, @yaroslavvb

body:
I downgraded my tensorflow installation to 0.12.1 release (4d924e796368163eff11a8151e8505715345f58d)
After the required API changes, my code seemed to run at a similar speed as I'm seeing with the latest head. So it might be possible that last few weeks I've been running it with the optimization bug with made it 4x faster (by copying the same batch onto all 4 GPUs), and the slowdown I'm seeing now is actually the expected speed given the amount of I/O I'm doing.

I'll debug some more on this, but thanks for the pointers and quick response, @yaroslavvb
